meanings.sent1: The tricarboxylic molecule has three carboxylic acid parts.
meanings.sent2: She studied the tricarboxylic compound in her chemistry class.
meanings.sent3: The tricarboxylic substance was so acidic, it made the lab assistant's eyes water.
meanings.sent4: The tricarboxylic structure was like a three-layered cake of acidity.
meanings.sent5: The tricarboxylic nature of the chemical made it highly reactive.

meanings.definition: Relating to a compound with three carboxylic acid groups.
meanings.sent1: The scientist analyzed the tricarboxylic properties of the compound.
meanings.sent2: The tricarboxylic characteristics of the substance were crucial for the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The tricarboxylic compound seemed to have a personality of its own.
meanings.sent4: Her explanation was as clear as a tricarboxylic crystal.
meanings.sent5: The tricarboxylic features of the solution were evident under the microscope.
